1.name: Jumkey
1.about: Homemade jewellery for all occasions. Perfect gifts for your loved ones. Customization available as well at additional costs.

2.name: The Donnut Shop
2.about: The best donuts in town! We aim to give 50% of our profits to charity. Do help us help others. Only open Mondays and Wednesdays for next-day delivery orders.

3.name: The Long table
3.about: Professional fine dining chef with 5 years of experience in degustation menu. Certified with WSQ Food Hygiene course. Order al carte dishes or full set menus to dine in the comfort of your home. [Order must be made 2 days in advance]

4.name: Sweet and Sassy
4.about: Cakes for all occasions. Retired baker of 15 years in a local hotel with a passion for making events more special. Be assured that you will receive quality cakes for the best value.

5.name: Dust and pearls
5.about: Designer masks to stand out from the crowds. Work from home mother hoping to earn a little more in this tough times.
